title: Limited Edition Prologo Scratch M5 saddles get signature treatment for Tadej Pogacar
content:
After winning last year’s Tour de France, Prologo is still celebrating Tadej Pogacar’s triumph. Now, leading up to this year’s grand depart, they’ve issued two extremely limited edition models of the same Scratch M5 saddle he rode to victory. The Scratch M5 saddles have an ergonomic “T SHAPE” that Prologo says is unisex and able […]

The post Limited Edition Prologo Scratch M5 saddles get signature treatment for Tadej Pogacar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
